item.description: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jXVWof7ISR8 Published on May 30, 2015 300mt/day Municipal Solid Waste Segregation, Composting & Material Recovery Plant - Managing waste of Navi Mumbai city. Established by Pyrocrat Systems LLP ‘ www.mswplant.com

item.title: Single-Stream Recycling -- Leading the Way to Zero Waste
item.description: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5YaTpL8nl7c Single Stream recycling Uploaded on Feb 17, 2011 Boulder County Recycling Center, Boulder, Colorado presents “Single-stream Recycling-Leading the Way to Zero Waste.” A 15:15 minute video offering an in-depth look at the single-stream recycling process at the Boulder County Recycling Center. The tour begins at the curbside recycling bin and follows the single-stream materials to the tipping floor of the Boulder County Recycling Center. Mr. Can, the star of the show, continues the recycling journey into the high-tech world of single-stream processing.
